QuestData.Title: Vengeance
QuestData.Description: The Army of the Light will not have fallen in vain.$B$BOur forces will assault the main encampment while we destroy their siege weapon.$B$BThis will be but the beginning of our vengeance.
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy the siege weapon at the Crown of Destruction.
QuestData.CompletionText: Until their weapon is no longer a threat, we are cornered here like vermin.
QuestData.RewardText: It seems we underestimated the Legion's cunning.
